name: (Sort of) Inspired by "Cheers" Online Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Bee Gees.

	Or, "You Should Be Danson" - as in Ted Danson, star of the show.

questions.text: What song has the line "we've got a '30 Ford wagon and we call it a woody" ?
questions.explanation:
Surf City.

	As in Woody Boyd or Woody Harrelson. (Good song.)

questions.text: Who wrote the music for "Bugsy Malone"?
questions.explanation:
Paul Williams.

	As in Sam Malone, the main character. (With Jodie Foster in the movie.)

Turtles.

	Or, "You, Bebe", as in Bebe Neuwirth, who played Frasier's wife.

questions.text: Which of these is (or was) not a real person?
questions.explanation:
Ichabod Crane.

	"Crane" - as in Frasier Crane. (Hart and Stephen were authors; Bob was the TV star of "Hogan's Heroes".)

questions.text: Which song was a hit for the Chambers Brothers?
questions.explanation:
Time Has Come Today.

	As in Diane Chambers - played nicely by Shelley Long.

Alfred Hitchcock.

	As in Rebecca Howe, played by Kirstie Alley. (Early Hitchcock.)

questions.text: Who played Craig T. Nelson's girlfriend in "Coach"?
questions.explanation:
Shelley Fabares.

	"Coach" - as played by Nicholas Colasanto.

Kevin Costner.

	Postman - as in Cliff Clavin. (Major bomb of a movie.)

questions.text: Norman Maine is a character in what movie?
questions.explanation:
A Star is Born.

	Probably "Norm" for short. (Best version has Judy Garland and James Mason.)
